title: How to Know if Someone Blocked You on Pinterest

steps.title: Go to the user's profile page.
steps.content: Go to the user's profile page.

steps.title: Try to follow the user.
steps.content: Try to follow the user. There should be a red "follow" button underneath their information. Click on the button.

steps.title: See if you get an error message.
steps.content: See if you get an error message. If you get an error that says, "Error following [username].", then it's likely that you've been blocked. If you are able to follow them, you are not blocked.

steps.title: Visit a Pin made by that user.
steps.content: Visit a Pin made by that user.

steps.title: Look for a comment box.
steps.content: Look for a comment box. If you cannot see a comment box, then you have been blocked.
